description:
Female Exorcist of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order] that appeared in http://anidb.net/ch7366 [Kanda Yuu]`s flashbacks.
She`s actually http://anidb.net/ch81263 [Alma Karma]`s previous incarnation, who was a female Exorcist who had died in battle. She and Kanda`s previous incarnation, http://anidb.net/ch84613 [another Exorcist], had been lovers.
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.
name: Alma Karma
